#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

int main()  {

    int t, n, x;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)  {
        cin>>n;
        while(n--)  {
            cin>>x;
            float digits = 0;
            while(x)  {
                digits += log10(x); x--;
            }
            cout<<(int)digits + 1<<" ";
        }
        cout<<endl;
    }
    /*float digits = 0;
    while(t)  {
        digits += log10(t);
        t--;
    }
    cout<<(int)digits + 1;*/
    return 0;
}
